results.title: Iran Security Chief Reaffirms Opposition to Regional Geopolitical Changes in Call with Armenian Counterpart
results.summary: Ali Akbar Ahmadian, Secretary of Iran’s Supreme National Security Council, restated Iran's opposition to geopolitical changes in a call with Armen Grigoryan. The discussion focused on the South Caucasus, with Ahmadian stressing the importance of preserving existing regional borders for the benefit of all. Grigoryan updated Ahmadian on Armenia's negotiations with Azerbaijan, affirming no change in their stance on regional transit routes. Ahmadian appreciated Armenia’s condemnation of the Israeli attack on Iran. Both parties emphasized stronger bilateral ties, especially in economics, to promote regional stability. results.title: EU Foreign Direct Investment Trends: Opportunities and Challenges for Vietnam
results.summary: This article from Tạp chí Cộng Sản examines the shifting trends in European Union (EU) foreign direct investment (FDI) and their implications for Vietnam. It notes that while the EU is a major global investor, its FDI flows have been affected by geopolitical tensions, technological advancements, and environmental concerns. The article highlights opportunities for Vietnam to attract quality EU capital by positioning itself as a reliable and safe investment destination, particularly in green transformation and digital sectors. Challenges include increased competition from other nations and the need for Vietnamese businesses to meet stringent EU standards.
